body_html: Just to spread some work that's been done in #445, we've managed to get TensorFlow compiled and running on the Raspberry Pi running Raspbian (although there hasn't been extensive testing yet). I've posted an unofficial pre-built Python wheel as well as step-by-step instructions on building from source yourself here.
body_text: Just to spread some work that's been done in #445, we've managed to get TensorFlow compiled and running on the Raspberry Pi running Raspbian (although there hasn't been extensive testing yet). I've posted an unofficial pre-built Python wheel as well as step-by-step instructions on building from source yourself here.
body: Just to spread some work that's been done in #445, we've managed to get TensorFlow compiled and running on the Raspberry Pi running Raspbian (although there hasn't been extensive testing yet). I've posted an unofficial pre-built Python wheel as well as step-by-step instructions on building from source yourself [here](https://github.com/samjabrahams/tensorflow-on-raspberry-pi).
